snippet: Thursday’s highlights from around the web include Businessweek’s cover story on the arms race brewing over Bitcoin mining. Plus, seven years ago, Steven P. Jobs of Apple unveiled the company’s first iPhone.
abstract: Thursday’s highlights from around the web include Businessweek’s cover story on the arms race brewing over Bitcoin mining. Plus, seven years ago, Steven P. Jobs of Apple unveiled the company’s first iPhone.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: A World of Bitcoins and Unicorns, and the Anniversary of the iPhone
